parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Firestone Tire Tread Separation and Blowout
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected failure of the tire can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injury or death.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Firestone Tire Valve Extension Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to properly check and maintain tire pressure due to faulty valve extensions can lead to tire failure, accidents, and potentially result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: Difficulty checking and maintaining tire pressure

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Rear Sensor and Substandard Wiring Harness in ABS System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning ABS system can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop, leading to increased stopping distances, and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels solid with no braking
causing uncontrolled braking; the brakes do not work properly
even after replacing the rear sensor; the problem is intermittent.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Frame Design Leading to Excessive Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate frame design can cause excessive vibration, leading to premature wear and failure of suspension and steering components, as well as structural damage, which can compromise vehicle safety and handling.
symptoms: loose or worn-out suspension and steering components
creaking or groaning noises from the frame or suspension
difficulty steering or maintaining control of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Suspension/Steering System Failure Due to Excessive Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of suspension and steering components can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Clunking or rattling noises from the suspension or steering
loose or worn-out suspension and steering components
difficulty steering or maintaining control of the vehicle
vibration or shaking of the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Structural Damage Due to Excessive Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Structural damage can compromise the integrity of the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Creaking or groaning noises from the frame or body
visible signs of structural damage or rust
difficulty opening or closing doors or compartments.
